description: Manages high-priority governance directives generated by GFRM, ensuring prioritized routing, latency tracking, and delivery confirmation.

processing_logic.intake: Validate payload against GFRM remediation_plan schema.
processing_logic.priority_injection: Enqueue based on defined 'priority' field, potentially preempting current tasks for level 1 directives.
processing_logic.dispatch: Route directive payload to the 'target_component' endpoint via secure inter-module bus (IMB).
processing_logic.verification_management: Initiates polling/awaiting response on the 'verification_hook' endpoint. Logs success/failure events to HIL.
